guide.title: User Guide
guide.subtitle: LILYGO Spark purpose and quick start
guide.purpose_text: LILYGO Spark is a cross-platform firmware hub and burner for LILYGO and other ESP devices. It lets developers, makers, and enthusiasts easily browse, download, and flash official or community firmware.
guide.purpose_1: Supports ESP32, ESP32-S3, ESP32-C6 and other Espressif chips
guide.purpose_2: One-stop browse and download of LILYGO official and community firmware
guide.purpose_3: Cross-platform on Windows, macOS, Linux with automatic board detection
guide.step1_title: Firmware Center — Choose product and firmware
guide.step1_desc: Select your LILYGO device on the left, browse official or community firmware, download, and flash directly.
guide.step2_desc: Connect your board via USB, select the serial port, choose a .bin firmware file, then click "Start Flashing" to burn.
guide.feature_firmware: Browse and download official or community firmware with product filtering
guide.feature_burner: One-click flash .bin to ESP32/ESP32-S3, serial console supported
guide.feature_dumper: Read and backup firmware from device
guide.feature_utilities: Firmware analyzer, partition editor, serial monitor and more
guide.for_developers_desc: If you need custom firmware sources or your own workflow:
guide.for_developers_1: Firmware manifests pull from GitHub Releases and repo file trees; LILYGO .bin files are hosted in product repos
guide.for_developers_2: In Settings → Advanced, you can specify a local manifest JSON to override the network manifest
guide.open_source_link: Visit GitHub to contribute and share feedback
